#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 1123456
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
int arr[MAX],N;
int LIS[MAX],ct;
void print(){
    for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
        cout << arr[i] << " ";
    cout << endl;
}

void read(){
    cin >> N;
    for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
        cin >> arr[i], arr[i] -= i;
}

void solve(){
    for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i){
        if (arr[i] <= 0) continue;
        if (ct == 0 || LIS[ct-1] <= arr[i])
            LIS[ct++] = arr[i];
        else if (LIS[0] > arr[i])
            LIS[0] = arr[i];
        else {
            int id = lower_bound(LIS,LIS+ct,arr[i]) - LIS;
            LIS[id] = arr[i];
        }
    }
    cout << N-ct << endl;
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    read();
    solve();
    return 0;
}
